Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Globe = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local globeGui local playerGui
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local globeSound
local snowAssets = {66868846, 66868857, 66868867, 66868876}
local gravImages = {}
local globeAnim
Tool.Enabled = true
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
globeSound = Globe:FindFirstChild("GlobeSound") if globeSound then globeSound:Play() end
globeAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.GlobeAnim) if globeAnim then globeAnim:Play() end
if globeGui then for a = 1, 3 do for i = 1, math.random(1, 12) do local snow = Instance.new("ImageLabel") snow.Parent = globeGui snow.Name = "Snow Flakes" snow.Position = UDim2.new(math.random(), 0, 0, 0) local randSize = math.random(-32, 32) snow.Size = UDim2.new(0, 48 + randSize, 0, 48 + randSize) local asset = math.random(1, #snowAssets) if asset == #snowAssets then snow.Size = UDim2.new(0, 16, 0, 16) end snow.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. snowAssets[asset] snow.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 table.insert(gravImages, snow) end wait(0.1) end end wait(0.1) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer then playerGui = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui and playerGui:FindFirstChild("GlobeGui") == nil then globeGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") globeGui.Parent = playerGui globeGui.Name = "GlobeGui" end end end
function onUnequipped() if globeGui then globeGui:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() while true do if gravImages and #gravImages > 0 then for i = 1, #gravImages do if gravImages[i] and gravImages[i].Position.Y.Scale > 1.0 then gravImages[i]:Remove() table.remove(gravImages, i) end if gravImages[i] then sign = math.random(-1, 1) gravImages[i].Position = UDim2.new(gravImages[i].Position.X.Scale + (sign * math.random()/100), 0, gravImages[i].Position.Y.Scale + 0.0096, 0) end end end wait() end end))
